title: Lance Witt on Balancing Health & Performance on Your Team - Episode 66
itunes:title: Lance Witt on Balancing Health & Performance on Your Team - Episode 66
description:
Do you ever feel like you have to choose between creating a healthy team culture and getting results? It doesn't have to be that way.

Lance Witt is the author of Replenish: Leading from a Healthy Soul and is a former executive and teaching pastor at Saddleback Church. In this episode, Tony and Lance discuss how to lead your team to find the essential balance between health and performance.

You can find more resources including this episode's FREE Discussion Guide and join the conversation by going to theunstuckgroup.com/episode66.
